Class GuiCreate

java.lang.Object
com.reese.mla.GuiCreate
public class GuiCreate extends Object
This class contains only static methods used for handing the GUI

      public GuiCreate()

  • Method Details

    • initialDBSelect

      public static void initialDBSelect(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This method is the startup screen for the application. It prompts the user for MySQL connection info.
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies.
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This handles the main menu for the application. Additionally, it holds buttons to display movies, Add a Movie, Modify a Movie, Delete a movie, and to exit the application
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies.
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.

    • displayMovies

      public static void displayMovies(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This handles the menu to display movies. This includes sorting buttons and displaying the average of all review scores.
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies.
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.

    • addMovie

      public static void addMovie(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This handles the menu to add a movie to the list.
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.

    • modifyMovieSearch

      public static void modifyMovieSearch(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This handles the menu to search for a movie to modify. Tightly related to modifyMovieSearch()
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
      See Also:
      • modifyMovie(ObservableList, int, Stage, ConnectionToPass)

    • modifyMovie

      public static void modifyMovie(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, int index, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      DO NOT CALL ON ITS OWN!!!! This method is called only from modifyMovieSearch(). This handles the menu that directly shows the areas of a movie to be modified
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies.
      index - This is the index of where the movie to be modified is.
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
      See Also:
      • modifyMovieSearch(ObservableList, Stage, ConnectionToPass)

    • deleteMovie

      public static void deleteMovie(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, javafx.stage.Stage stage, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This handles the menu that prompts for a movie to delete and, if user permitting, delete the entry from the list.
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies
      stage - This is the main stage that the program runs off of.
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
